post:
FtpIt is a privately-held professional hosting company founded in Ohio, USA. We are a leading provider of un-managed VPS hosting. We provide hosting solutions and technology to successful individuals, entrepreneurs and small to medium-sized business around the globe. We have been in business for more than one and half year.

This post is to celebrate Black Friday :).

All SSD servers run on pure SSD disks with RAID10 and the latest Intel Xeon E3 CPUs, backed up by an LSI RAID card! KVM plans are backed by E5 CPU, with at least 128 GB of RAM along with a premium network.

Plans will be instantly activated upon payment receipt.Payments for FtpIt are now accepted via PayPal, Credit and Debit cards,payza and Bitcoins(via BitPay).

Network info:

Buffalo http://192.210.150.2/100MB.test 

Los Angeles http://192.3.23.126/100MB.test


We don't allow the following on our servers, anyone found using them will be terminated instantly: 

Resource Hogs including, but not limited to Minecraft 

Anything related to Digital Currencies mining 

TOR/Torrents 

Mass mail/SPAM

Anything illegal in the USA 

Legal adult content is allowed

For more information, please visit: http://www.ftpit.com .
